name: rule-of-three-calculator
title: Rule of Three Calculator
description: Simplify your calculations with the Rule of Three Calculator Raycast extension. Quickly determine proportional values by entering known quantities and letting the extension do the math for you. Ideal for anyone needing fast, accurate calculations in business, science, or everyday tasks.
author: luarmr

commands.name: index
commands.title: Rule of Three
commands.subtitle: Calculator
commands.description: Enter the known values to calculate the proportional result using the Rule of Three. Input the first pair of related quantities and one additional value to find the missing fourth value effortlessly

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
